text:
@GovAbbott But open up! You said all churches should open. Holy Ghost Catholic Church did as you said. Now one priest has died from covid-19, others infected. I don’t know what language you need to hear this in. WITHOUT WIDESPREAD TESTING NO ONE KNOWS IF IT’S SAFE. 

https://t.co/gWUybg6Trd
